data.actual_result: It is inserted into a channel in which you don't have permissions for. However, you are not able to send such GIF in the channel.
data.expected_result: The GIF does not get inserted into the channel.
data.short_description: Inputting a GIF into the search allows adds the GIF to a channel in which Send Message permissions are not granted.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel in which you are not able to send messages - Open the search menu in the channel -Using Google Keyboard insert a GIF
